Question
========

Consider the following process $y_t = 3t + y_{t-1}+u_t$, where $u_t$ is a whte noise.
Which of the weakly stationarity conditions are violated.


Answerlist
----------

*  Constant mean 
*  Constant variance  
*  Autocovariance function depends only on the difference between time indexes
*  None of the conditions are violated, the process is stationary


Solution
========

Check mean and covariance functions.
